For fucks sake... Arc is a old archival format. There was a time whiny bitches complained loudly about rars being used instead of zips.  Now the same idiots are complaining again. 

If you cannot figure out how to use an archive of any sort, then it is not for you. And I strongly advise you to bother to look it up before you presume it is a defunct archive format.

Yes! Got this to work by applying the crack adawadawada listed and it worked. Anyone having problems, make sure to block the HKShip.exe file and allow the buddha.dll file through your firewall. Most anti-virus programs will delete the buddha.dll file and it won't work without it. Thanks uploader!
